subject: Return/ Refund Request
description_text:
Hi, sorry for the late reply however I only now have had some free time. I
recently bought a product from your collection ( on the 1st of october 2025
at 20:58:53) in the form of the "Simsonn Racing Simulator Leather Steering
Wheel" and to be honest with you the quality of the product is far, *far, *from
what I expected at the pricing of the product. And for this reason I would
like to request a full refund of the product.

Here is a list of all the problems which I had with the product:

1. Poor quality leather - I believe that at this price range I would get
leather that is at least some resistant and sweat, this was not the case!
Only an hour or 2 after using the leather around the steering wheel started
to feel rougher and rougher with each passing minute and at which point my
hand started being covered in black particles from the leather not being
able to sustain moderate use.

2. The quality of the buttons. Although some buttons like the red switches
I did find to be pretty good and a nice addition, this quality did not
persist in the rest of the products' buttons. For example, my biggest
problem is in the physical buttons which have really long travel and which
feel like you're not even pressing them half the time.

3. Really loud switches/ clicks in the shifter pads. This one is pretty
self explanatory but I have tried many different wheels like the ones from
Simagic or the Logitech wheels and all were *nowhere *close to as loud as
the ones on this wheel.

4. Lack of customization/ missing items from the box. I watched some
reviews of the wheel before buying it and saw that people received stickers
with their package which could be put on the wheel. However, I did not
receive any of these with mine and more weirdly mine came with pre-applied
stickers which makes me wonder if the wheel I was sent was used before.

5. Poor stitching quality. As mentioned above I used the wheel for a total
of around 1-2 hours and in those 1-2 hours the stitching around the leather
started to become fizzy and almost looks like it's starting to come off. I
can't even stand to imagine what this will become after even a full day or
2 of use.

6. The last problem I will mention is the lack of support in the
Simsonn software. This could have been my mistake but I also bought some
pedals a while ago which I was and still am really satisfied with but when
using the pedals with the Simsonn manager app I could see that there were
sections for a steering wheel in the app however no mention of wheels being
compatible with that. And because of that I believed that the wheels sold
by you are actually compatible with it. However, as you might know this is
not the case but I spent almost an hour trying to troubleshoot why it was
not connecting as there was no actual indication that the wheel was
actually connected.

Finally, I would like to request that I be refunded for this and I am happy
to send back the wheel as soon as you approve it. I do want to mention that
the wheel was fitted with a 3rd party adapter from Moza as the one you sold
with the wheel had to information on being compatible or not with Simagic
wheel bases.
Thank you for your time and hope we can come to an agreement.

Your sincerely,
Alex Ancuta
